section.title: What the next generation Jmol will look like
section.p: Early this year, Miguel Howard decided to completely rewrite the rendering engine, to provide true 3D capabilities. These pages are previewing the Jmol applet using that engine.

The pages demo the capabilities of rendering atoms, bonds, biochemical concepts, dotted surfaces, and there is one page, that shows the ability of the Jmol applet to completely replace the Chime plugin in webpages.
